message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great deal on this product. I think it would be perfect for you and I'm willing to part with it for $13,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate the deal, but I'm looking to pay closer to $10,000.  Would you be willing to come down to that?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob.  While $10,000 is a bit too low for me, I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about $11,500?
